title: Bug 109350: Output parameter not displaying in data set dialog
description: When calling a stored procedure from an Oracle database, the query result is stored in an output parameter as an object. However, in the query result page, the output parameter is not displayed in the data set dialog.
OB: The output parameter is not displayed in the data set dialog when calling a stored procedure and retrieving the query result from an Oracle database.
EB: The output parameter should be displayed in the data set dialog when calling a stored procedure and retrieving the query result from an Oracle database.
SR:
1. Call a stored procedure from an Oracle database.
2. Retrieve the query result stored in the output parameter as an object.
3. Open the data set dialog in the query result page.
4. Verify that the output parameter is displayed in the data set dialog.
